The main method of the Warzone game application.
Main - Class in app.warzone
This is the main runner class which is the root of the project

Main.Phase - Enum in app.warzone
An enumeration representing the different phases of the Warzone game.
Map - Class in app.warzone.map
The Map class represents a game map, which includes continents and countries.
Map(String) - Constructor for class app.warzone.map.Map
Constructs a Map object with the given name.
MAP_ACTIONS - Enum constant in enum app.warzone.Main.Phase
 
MapFileParser - Class in app.warzone.map
The MapFileParser class parses a Warzone map file and constructs a map based on its contents.
MapFileParser(String) - Constructor for class app.warzone.map.MapFileParser
Constructs a MapFileParser for parsing a map file with the given name.
MapFileParserTest - Class in app.warzone.map
Test class for the MapFileParser class, which is responsible for parsing map files.
MapFileParserTest() - Constructor for class app.warzone.map.MapFileParserTest
 
MapTest - Class in app.warzone.map
This class contains unit tests for the Map class, which represents the game map in Warzone.
MapTest() - Constructor for class app.warzone.map.MapTest
 
MapUtils - Class in app.warzone.map
The MapUtils class provides utility functions to edit and manage the game map.
MapUtils() - Constructor for class app.warzone.map.MapUtils
 
MapUtilsTest - Class in app.warzone.map
Test class for the MapUtils class, which provides utility methods for editing maps.
MapUtilsTest() - Constructor for class app.warzone.map.MapUtilsTest
 
MapValidator - Class in app.warzone.map
This class performs validation of map correctness, also after loading and saving any new map the map will be validated automatically.
MapValidator() - Constructor for class app.warzone.map.MapValidator
 
MapValidatorTest - Class in app.warzone.map
This class contains unit tests for the MapValidator class, which validates map and continent structures in the Warzone game.
MapValidatorTest() - Constructor for class app.warzone.map.MapValidatorTest
